name: Dragon Dating Simulator
description:
A shut-in teenager obsessed with visual novel games, you wake up one day to find out you've been expelled from school for truancy! When no other school will take you and you're at your wit's end, you receive a mysterious invitation in the mail.....

Class is in session! Welcome to St. Tiamat's School for Young Dragons!

Go to school, make friends, go on dates, and maybe even fall in love? Make the right choices, and you may be granted the greatest honor of all-- seeing a dragon's PERSONAL HOARD!

Features of the game:

  • Choose from three love interests of varying genders
  • Make choices to get a romantic or friendship ending-- no bad endings here! (8 endings in total)
  • Choose your own name and pronouns
  • Over 35k words (around 2 hours of playtime across all routes)

Made by Trinity Thatcher  ( Twitter  .  Twitch )

Sprite Assets by LuckyFields  (   Twitter  ,  Newgrounds  )
